glsa.title: SARG: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code
glsa.synopsis: Multiple stack-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities were discovered in SARG allowing for remote code execution.

background.p: SARG is the Squid Analysis Report Generator.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities were discovered in SARG. For further information please consult the CVE entries referenced below.

impact.p: These vulnerabilities might allow attackers to execute arbitrary code via unknown vectors.
NOTE: This is a legacy GLSA. Updates for all affected architectures are available since April 18, 2009. It is likely that your system is already no longer affected by this issue.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All SARG users should upgrade to the latest version:
